column1: Little Goat Diner////The Rooftop Bar is amazing. I love how it is totally acceptable that you could bring your family here and
column2: unlike a lot of trendy food places
column3: no one really minds. The chili cheese fries are to die for
column4: the fried pickles were the best thing I've had fried in a long time (bread and butter genius)
column5: tThe pork belly pancake had great flavor (a little short on the pork belly) and the Beef Sandwich was incredibly tender. The Mac and cheese was killer as a big enough side for the table to share. The only thing I didn't love was the dish I ordered
column6: the fish tostadas. They were OK. Could have used more depth of flavor.
